Others: Utah Jazz lost their first home game of the season to the Memphis Grizzlies (120-124).
Golden State Warriors won their first game of the season against the Portland Trail Blazers (104-140).
Stephen Curry scored 20 points in the Warriors' win against the Blazers.
Andrew Wiggins scored 22 points in the Warriors' win against the Blazers.
Buddy Hield was the top scorer of the game with 22 points for the Warriors.
Collin Sexton is the probable starting point guard for Utah Jazz.
Lauri Markkanen is the probable starting power forward for Utah Jazz.
Walker Kessler is the probable starting center for Utah Jazz.
Golden State Warriors have lost Klay Thompson and Chris Paul during the offseason.
Golden State Warriors have added Deantony Melton, Kyle Anderson, Waters II, and Hield to their roster.
